an10.100:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an10.100:1.3: Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ, mānaṁ—
an10.100:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an10.100:2.1: Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ.
an10.100:2.3: Rāgaṁ, dosaṁ, mohaṁ, kodhaṁ, upanāhaṁ, makkhaṁ, paḷāsaṁ, issaṁ, macchariyaṁ, mānaṁ—
an10.100:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātun”ti.
